entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h near the Strait of Georgia late this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 04 January 2023
